definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[קרן]] (√ of foll.; mng. dub.; cf. As. ḳarnu, Ar. qarnun, Eth. qarn: NH [[קֶרֶן]], ph. [[קרן]], Aram. [[קַרְנָא]], qarno0, all horn; Sab. [[קרן]] spur of mt. (?) Hom:Chrest. 127; v. also Ar. qarnun part of man’s head where horns are in beasts, qurnah;un corner, extremity, of anything Frey, horn of uterus, Lane).
